title: Samuel Candler Dobbs Professor of Art History
research_focus_description: Bonna Daix Wescoat's research focuses on Ancient Greek art and architecture, emphasizing Archaic and Hellenistic architectural trends and architectural sculpture. She directs excavations and field research in the Sanctuary of the Great Gods, Samothrace.
link_to_bio: Not directly provided, but potentially found under the faculty section of the Art History Department at Emory University's website.
